snippet.title: Dead Cells: The Queen and the Sea DLC - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The Queen and the Sea DLC will bring two extra late-game biomes (one with a twist!) & a deadly new boss, completing the Beheaded's epic journey outside the castle PLUS giving you a new ending.

Coming early 2022 for $4.99 and regional equivalents on PC and consoles. 

More information coming soon!

Wishlist it on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1580050/Dead_Cells_The_Queen_and_the_Sea/

Sales of this DLC will let us continue to produce our regular free updates and develop as many of our ideas for Dead Cells as possible. 

Music by: Yoann "Valmont" Laulan - https://valmontderagondas.bandcamp.com 

Discord - discord.gg/kPHcQk9
Reddit - reddit.com/r/deadcells 
Twitter - twitter.com/motiontwin 
Facebook - facebook.com/dead.cells.game
